overview: Marcus Williamson is a seasoned professional with more than 23 years of experience in surgical facilities, hospitals and ambulatory surgery centers. Prior to joining NeoSpine, Williamson served as the Director of Operations for AmSurg Corp., a Nashville-based owner and operator of outpatient surgical facilities. Williamson was responsible for partnership board governance, acquisition due diligence, strategic planning, as well as leadership training and development. Williamsonâ€™s projects included growth within some of the more challenging markets in the country. Additionally, Williamson spent more than nine years working specifically with physician practice partnerships at AmSurg. Before AmSurg, Williamson served in director roles with Prudential HealthCare, Cigna, Focus HealthCare and United HealthCare with a concentration in physician services, network development and executive level contract negotiation.
